Package wargame.screens

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonsListener
    Class to manage the actions on radio buttons.
    ConfigScreen
    Screen configuration.
    ConfigScreenActionManager
    manage the buttons actions.
    Form
    Represents the whole form panel
    GameScreen
    Defines a screen of the game and the methods it implements/overwrites.
    GameScreenActionManager
    This action manager does nothing.
    GameScreenKeyboardManager
    This action manager does nothing.
    GameScreenMouseManager
    This action manager does nothing.
    GameScreenMouseMotionManager
    This action manager does nothing.
    LoadGameScreen
    The screen to load a saved game.
    LoadGameScreenActionManager
    Manage the actions of the buttons.
    MainScreen
    This screen is the first screen of the game, the main menu.
    MainScreenActionManager
    Manage the actions of the buttons.
    NewGameScreen
    This screen displays the parameters to generate a map, select the difficult of the game etc.
    NewGameScreenActionManager
    Manage the actions of the buttons.
    PlayGameScreen
    Defines the main screen of the game (when we are playing).
    PlayGameScreenActionManager
    Class used to manage button action on the map screen.
    PlayGameScreenKeyboardManager
    Class used to manage the keyboard inputs on the map screen.
    PlayGameScreenMouseManager
    Class used to manage the mouse on the map screen.
    PlayGameScreenMouseMotionManager
    Class used to manage mouse motions on the map screen.
    QuickGameScreen
    This screen is never displayed.
    QuickGameScreenActionManager
    Manage the actions of the buttons.
    SidePanelActionManager
    Class used to manage buttons actions on the side panel.
    SidePanelKeyboardManager
    Class used to manage the keyboard inputs on the side panel.
    SidePanelMouseManager
    Class used to manage mouse clicks on the side panel.
    SidePanelMouseMotionManager
    Class used to manage the mouse motion on the side panel.
